Recording Solutions

Digital Video Recorders

Professional DVR solutions for reliable video recording and storage management. Explore our range of UNV DVRs with advanced features for security surveillance.

XVR301-04U3-P4

1 HDD 4-channel 1U Digital Video Recorder supporting Ultra 265/H.265/H.264 video formats, with audio over coaxial cable and long transmission distance.

Supports Ultra 265/H.265/H.264 video formats
Supports audio over coaxial cable (TVI cameras)
Control dual-light of UNV analog cameras under TVI

XVR301-04U3-P4

Professional 4-channel network video recorder supporting Ultra 265/H.265/H.264 video formats, with audio over coaxial cable and long transmission distance.

Supports Ultra 265/H.265/H.264 video formats
Supports audio over coaxial cable (TVI cameras)
Control dual-light of UNV analog cameras under TVI

XVR301-08U3

1 HDD 16-Channel 1U Digital Video Recorder with support for multiple video formats, coaxial audio, and up to 4K output resolution

Support Ultra 265/H.265/H.264 video formats
Support audio over coaxial cable (only for TVI cameras)
Control the dual-light of UNV analog cameras under TVI
